item.title: RFC: li3_fixtures Rewrite
item.description: The li3_fixtures plugin was my first Lithium plugin ever, and while it works okay, I feel there is a lot I can do to make it better and more flexible. In this post I want to share my ideas for a new fixture plugin and also want to gather feedback from the community to make it even more awesome. As far as I can see, there are three big use cases for fixtures:
